name: Gemini Ablation
text:
During the Main Phase: You can discard 1 card, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 Gemini monster from your Deck, and if you do, it becomes an Effect Monster and gains its effects.
● Tribute 1 Gemini monster, and if you do, Special Summon 1 FIRE Warrior monster from your hand or Deck, then if the Tributed monster was treated as an Effect Monster and gained its effects, you can destroy 1 card on the field.
You can only use this effect of "Gemini Ablation" once per turn.
